channel.title: Please can someone help?
channel.description: Ok I have been asking for someones help for almost a week and noone has responded in any help at all... :( Everyone says i haven't port forwarded correctly so I ask once more... Can someone please use teamviewer and show me how??? there are about 12 ip addresses that Apply to my machine and I have no idea which one To Connect. I also have a wierd router setup.. My modem connects to a router. That router connects to 1 computer and another router. the second router connects to 2 machines. So i have 2 routers in series... Do i need to port forward on both??? :confused: if so how whould i tell the first one to open to the second one? Also I am not sure I am setting the ip up right in my client... I tried using a regualr ip instead of no-ip and i haven't gotten it to work either way... :( All the Players get back is "Error connecting to server" Any help??? My computer can connect if I change the clients ip to 127.0.0.1 (localhost) but as soon as i change it to anything else nothing works anymore... If someone can use teamviewer to fix this for me please! it gets really frustrating when you can't get a server to connect after 2 years! Come on, someone??? please??? no one can help me when all of you know how to do this?

item.title: Please can someone help?
item.dc:creator: @Valcorex Valcorex
item.description:
@Valcorex wrote:

Ok I have been asking for someones help for almost a week and noone has responded in any help at all… Everyone says i haven’t port forwarded correctly so I ask once more… Can someone please use teamviewer and show me how??? there are about 12 ip addresses that Apply to my machine and I have no idea which one To Connect. I also have a wierd router setup… My modem connects to a router. That router connects to 1 computer and another router. the second router connects to 2 machines. So i have 2 routers in series… Do i need to port forward on both??? if so how whould i tell the first one to open to the second one?
Also I am not sure I am setting the ip up right in my client… I tried using a regualr ip instead of no-ip and i haven’t gotten it to work either way… All the Players get back is “Error connecting to server” Any help??? My computer can connect if I change the clients ip to 127.0.0.1 (localhost) but as soon as i change it to anything else nothing works anymore… If someone can use teamviewer to fix this for me please! it gets really frustrating when you can’t get a server to connect after 2 years! Come on, someone??? please??? no one can help me when all of you know how to do this?

Read full topic
